channel.title: ide on Dilip Kushwaha
channel.description: Recent content in ide on Dilip Kushwaha

item.title: Use Qt Creator as full fledged C++ IDE
item.description: I was putting efforts to learn C++ for so many months but didn’t find any suitable IDE on which I can practice. Then few months ago, one of my friend introduced me to Qt Creator, as one of the best IDE for C++. During the free time in this summer I gave it a try and started learning the language with the help of a ebook on this IDE. And surprisingly, I found Qt Creator to be perfect in so many ways. Every feature I was looking for previously, is available in it.
